hotel.description: Çatı katında teras ile manzaranın tadını çıkartın ve ücretsiz kablosuz İnternet ve danışma (concierge) hizmetleri gibi imkânlardan/kolaylıklardan yararlanın. Bu Art Deco stili otelde ayrıca ortak alanda televizyon ve banket salonu vardır.

roomList.name: STANDARD ROOM NRF
roomList.description:
1 çift Kişilik Yatak veya 2 tek Kişilik Yatak

22 metrekare büyüklüğünde


İnternet - Ücretsiz kablosuz ve kablolu internet erişimi

Eğlence - plazma TV ve uydu kanalları

Yemek ve İçecek - Kahve/çay makinesi, minibar (ücretler geçerli olabilir), elektrikli su ısıtıcısı ve 24 saat oda servisi

Yatak Özellikleri - Yastık menüsü

Banyo - Özel banyo, bornoz ve geniş duş başlığı olan duş

Faydalı Bilgiler - Emanet kasası, masa ve telefon

Konfor - Otomatik soğutma/ısıtma sistemi ve günlük kat hizmetleri

Bilmeniz Gerekenler - Çarşaf takımı yoktur, beşik (çocuk yatağı) veya portatif/ilave yatak yoktur

Sigara İçilmez ve Sigara İçilebilir

options.specialNotes:
SCT: [Standard Double or Twin Room - Non-refundable - Breakfast included in the price - Free WiFi]. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property. Alcoholic drinks are not available at the hotel.. POLICY_CHILDREN: Children of any age are allowed. 1 child (up to and including 2 years old) stays for free when using available cots.	
1 child (up to and including 5 years old) stays for free when using available extra beds.	
1 person (6 years old and over) stays for € 30 per child per night when using available extra beds.	
The maximum number of extra beds is 1.
The maximum number of cots is 1.
The maximum number of guests is 5.. POLICY_HOTEL_GROUPS: When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.. POLICY_HOTEL_INTERNET: WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.. POLICY_HOTEL_PARKING: Free public parking is possible at a location nearby (reservation is not needed).. POLICY_HOTEL_PETS: Pets are not allowed.. POLICY_PREAUTHORIZE: The property reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival.. POLICY_HOTEL_EXTRACHARGES: 10 % VAT is included. 2 % government tax is excluded.. 31.42 EUR VAT is included. 6.28 EUR government tax is excluded. This luxurious room is tastefully decorated in soft colours. It includes air conditioning and an LCD TV. Tea&coffee setup and kettle service are complimentary.. Breakfast is included in the room rate.. Licence number:  14.05.2012-13556

SCT: [Connected Family Room - Non-refundable - Breakfast included in the price - Free WiFi]. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. A damage deposit of EUR 100 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property. Alcoholic drinks are not available at the hotel.. POLICY_CHILDREN: Children of any age are allowed. 1 child (up to and including 2 years old) stays for free when using available cots.	
1 child (up to and including 5 years old) stays for free when using available extra beds.	
1 person (6 years old and over) stays for € 30 per child per night when using available extra beds.	
The maximum number of extra beds is 1.
The maximum number of cots is 1.
The maximum number of guests is 5.. POLICY_HOTEL_GROUPS: When booking more than 3 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.. POLICY_HOTEL_INTERNET: WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.. POLICY_HOTEL_PARKING: Free public parking is possible at a location nearby (reservation is not needed).. POLICY_HOTEL_PETS: Pets are not allowed.. POLICY_PREAUTHORIZE: The property reserves the right to pre-authorise credit cards prior to arrival.. POLICY_HOTEL_EXTRACHARGES: 10 % VAT is included. 2 % government tax is excluded.. 49.18 EUR VAT is included. 9.84 EUR government tax is excluded. This luxurious room has walls with wooden panelling. It includes 2 connected bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It is equipped with air conditioning and an LCD TV. Tea&coffee setup and kettle service are complimentary.

Please note that the single beds in this room type are extra beds. No extra charges will be applied.. Breakfast is included in the room rate.. Licence number:  14.05.2012-13556
